channel.title: Remove an item when attacking?
channel.description: Does anyone know how too automatically remove a certain item your wearing if you start to attack an NPC or another player? For example if someone is weilding Item ID 1234 and they start to attack an NPC or Player the item automatically moves to that players invintory, if the invintory is full, it moves to the bank?

item.title: Remove an item when attacking?
item.dc:creator: @dillingo dillingo
item.description:
@dillingo wrote:

Thank you 'Rich, I’ll give it a try.[br][br][size=1]Posted on: July 12, 2009, 08:52:15 pm[/size][hr][quote="`Rich, post:2, topic:288421"] if (p.playerEquipment[0] == 1234) { if (p.frames.getOpenSlots() < 1) { p.bank.bankItem(1234, p.playerEquipmentN[0]); p.playerEquipment[0] = -1; p.playerEquipmentN[0] = 0; } else { p.equipment.removeEquipment(0); } return; }[/quote]

I’m still having some trouble with this… Is that example based off delta, because I’ve never used delta. Also wouldn’t it be if (playerEquipment[playerCape] == 1234) (Assuming Item 1234 is a cape)
I might be wrong, but can you clarify why it would be if (p.playerEquipment[0] == 1234)

Read full topic

item.title: Remove an item when attacking?
item.dc:creator: @_Rich Rich
item.description:
@_Rich wrote:

Removing spam, if you guys want to argue, do it in a private message.

Read full topic

item.title: Remove an item when attacking?
item.dc:creator: @_Rich Rich
item.description:
@_Rich wrote:

Example;

if (p.playerEquipment[0] == 1234) { if (p.frames.getOpenSlots() < 1) { p.bank.bankItem(1234, p.playerEquipmentN[0]); p.playerEquipment[0] = -1; p.playerEquipmentN[0] = 0; } else { p.equipment.removeEquipment(0); } return; }

Read full topic
